blocks.name: zfnuleuOLD
blocks.content: Obsolete version of ~ nulmo as of 17-Sep-2022. (Contributed by NM, 22-Dec-2007.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm zfnuleuOLD(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  |- weu(s0, wal(s1, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  -| wex(s0, wal(s1, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  mpbir(weu(s0, wal(s1, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), weu(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wfal))))
  ax-mp(weu(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wfal))), wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wfal))))
  mpbi(wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wfal))), wex(s0, wal(s1, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))
  exbii(s0, wal(s1, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))), wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wfal)))
  mpbi(wi(wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wfal))), weu(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wfal)))), wmo(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wfal))))
  axextmo(s0, s1, wfal)
  nfv(s0, wfal)
  moeu(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wfal)))
  eubii(s0, wal(s1, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))), wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wfal)))
  albii(s1, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wfal))
  nbfal(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  diff.wfal.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm zfnuleuOLD(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  âŠ¢ âˆƒ!(s0, âˆ€(s1, Â¬ s1 âˆˆ s0))
  âŠ£ âˆƒ(s0, âˆ€(s1, Â¬ s1 âˆˆ s0))
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  mpbir(âˆƒ!(s0, âˆ€(s1, Â¬ s1 âˆˆ s0)), âˆƒ!(s0, âˆ€(s1,(s1 âˆˆ s0 â†” F))))
  ax-mp(âˆƒ!(s0, âˆ€(s1,(s1 âˆˆ s0 â†” F))), âˆƒ(s0, âˆ€(s1,(s1 âˆˆ s0 â†” F))))
  mpbi(âˆƒ(s0, âˆ€(s1,(s1 âˆˆ s0 â†” F))), âˆƒ(s0, âˆ€(s1, Â¬ s1 âˆˆ s0)))
  exbii(s0, âˆ€(s1, Â¬ s1 âˆˆ s0), âˆ€(s1,(s1 âˆˆ s0 â†” F)))
  mpbi((âˆƒ(s0, âˆ€(s1,(s1 âˆˆ s0 â†” F)))â†’ âˆƒ!(s0, âˆ€(s1,(s1 âˆˆ s0 â†” F)))), âˆƒ*(s0, âˆ€(s1,(s1 âˆˆ s0 â†” F))))
  axextmo(s0, s1, wfal)
  nfv(s0, wfal)
  moeu(s0, âˆ€(s1,(s1 âˆˆ s0 â†” F)))
  eubii(s0, âˆ€(s1, Â¬ s1 âˆˆ s0), âˆ€(s1,(s1 âˆˆ s0 â†” F)))
  albii(s1, Â¬ s1 âˆˆ s0, (s1 âˆˆ s0 â†” F))
  nbfal(s1 âˆˆ s0)
  diff.wfal.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: axnulALT
blocks.content: Alternate proof of ~ axnul , proved from propositional calculus, ~ ax-gen , ~ ax-4 , ~ sp , and ~ ax-rep . To check this, replace ~ sp with the obsolete axiom ~ ax-c5 in the proof of ~ axnulALT and type the Metamath program "MM> SHOW TRACE_BACK axnulALT / AXIOMS" command. (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 3-Feb-2008.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2016.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm axnulALT(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  |- wex(s0, wal(s1, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  mpbir(wex(s0, wal(s1, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wal(s0, wfal)))))))
  mpg(hs0, wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wal(s0, wfal)))))), wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s0, wfal), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))
  ax-rep(hs0, s0, s1, hs1, wfal)
  mpg(s1, wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s0, wfal), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), wi(wal(s0, wfal), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  sylibr(wal(s1, wi(wal(s0, wfal), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))), wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s0, wfal), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), wn(wal(s0, wn(wal(s1, wi(wal(s0, wfal), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))))
  con2i(wal(s1, wi(wal(s0, wfal), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))), wal(s0, wn(wal(s1, wi(wal(s0, wfal), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))))
  sp(s0, wn(wal(s1, wi(wal(s0, wfal), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))
  df-ex(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s0, wfal), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  pm2.21i(wal(s0, wfal), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  exbii(s0, wal(s1, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))), wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wal(s0, wfal))))))
  albii(s1, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wal(s0, wfal)))))
  nbn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wal(s0, wfal))))
  nex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wal(s0, wfal)))
  intnan(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wal(s0, wfal))
  mto(wal(s0, wfal), wfal)
  fal()
  sp(s0, wfal)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm axnulALT(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  âŠ¢ âˆƒ(s0, âˆ€(s1, Â¬ s1 âˆˆ s0))
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  mpbir(âˆƒ(s0, âˆ€(s1, Â¬ s1 âˆˆ s0)), âˆƒ(s0, âˆ€(s1,(s1 âˆˆ s0 â†” âˆƒ(hs0,(hs0 âˆˆ hs1 âˆ§ âˆ€(s0, F)))))))
  mpg(hs0, âˆƒ(s0, âˆ€(s1,(s1 âˆˆ s0 â†” âˆƒ(hs0,(hs0 âˆˆ hs1 âˆ§ âˆ€(s0, F)))))), âˆƒ(s0, âˆ€(s1,(âˆ€(s0, F)â†’ s1 = s0))))
  ax-rep(hs0, s0, s1, hs1, wfal)
  mpg(s1, âˆƒ(s0, âˆ€(s1,(âˆ€(s0, F)â†’ s1 = s0))), (âˆ€(s0, F)â†’ s1 = s0))
  sylibr(âˆ€(s1,(âˆ€(s0, F)â†’ s1 = s0)), âˆƒ(s0, âˆ€(s1,(âˆ€(s0, F)â†’ s1 = s0))), Â¬ âˆ€(s0, Â¬ âˆ€(s1,(âˆ€(s0, F)â†’ s1 = s0))))
  con2i(âˆ€(s1,(âˆ€(s0, F)â†’ s1 = s0)), âˆ€(s0, Â¬ âˆ€(s1,(âˆ€(s0, F)â†’ s1 = s0))))
  sp(s0, Â¬ âˆ€(s1,(âˆ€(s0, F)â†’ s1 = s0)))
  df-ex(s0, âˆ€(s1,(âˆ€(s0, F)â†’ s1 = s0)))
  pm2.21i(âˆ€(s0, F), s1 = s0)
  exbii(s0, âˆ€(s1, Â¬ s1 âˆˆ s0), âˆ€(s1,(s1 âˆˆ s0 â†” âˆƒ(hs0,(hs0 âˆˆ hs1 âˆ§ âˆ€(s0, F))))))
  albii(s1, Â¬ s1 âˆˆ s0, (s1 âˆˆ s0 â†” âˆƒ(hs0,(hs0 âˆˆ hs1 âˆ§ âˆ€(s0, F)))))
  nbn(s1 âˆˆ s0, âˆƒ(hs0,(hs0 âˆˆ hs1 âˆ§ âˆ€(s0, F))))
  nex(hs0, (hs0 âˆˆ hs1 âˆ§ âˆ€(s0, F)))
  intnan(hs0 âˆˆ hs1, âˆ€(s0, F))
  mto(âˆ€(s0, F), wfal)
  fal()
  sp(s0, wfal)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: axnul
blocks.content: The Null Set Axiom of ZF set theory: there exists a set with no elements. Axiom of Empty Set of [Enderton] p. 18. In some textbooks, this is presented as a separate axiom; here we show it can be derived from Separation ~ ax-sep . This version of the Null Set Axiom tells us that at least one empty set exists, but does not tell us that it is unique - we need the Axiom of Extensionality to do that (see ~ nulmo ). This proof, suggested by Jeff Hoffman, uses only ~ ax-4 and ~ ax-gen from predicate calculus, which are valid in "free logic" i.e. logic holding in an empty domain (see Axiom A5 and Rule R2 of [LeBlanc] p. 277). Thus, our ~ ax-sep implies the existence of at least one set. Note that Kunen's version of ~ ax-sep (Axiom 3 of [Kunen] p. 11) does not imply the existence of a set because his is universally closed, i.e., prefixed with universal quantifiers to eliminate all free variables. His existence is provided by a separate axiom stating ` E. x x = x ` (Axiom 0 of [Kunen] p. 10). See ~ axnulALT for a proof directly from ~ ax-rep . This theorem should not be referenced by any proof. Instead, use ~ ax-nul below so that the uses of the Null Set Axiom can be more easily identified. (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 3-Feb-2008.) (Revised by NM, 4-Feb-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm axnul(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  |- wex(s0, wal(s1, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  eximii(s0, wal(s1, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))), wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wfal))))
  ax-sep(s0, s1, hs0, wfal)
  alimi(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wfal)), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  mtbiri(wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wfal)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wfal))
  intnan(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wfal)
  fal()
  id(wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wfal)))
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wfal.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wfal)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm axnul(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  âŠ¢ âˆƒ(s0, âˆ€(s1, Â¬ s1 âˆˆ s0))
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  eximii(s0, âˆ€(s1, Â¬ s1 âˆˆ s0), âˆ€(s1,(s1 âˆˆ s0 â†”(s1 âˆˆ hs0 âˆ§ F))))
  ax-sep(s0, s1, hs0, wfal)
  alimi(s1, (s1 âˆˆ s0 â†”(s1 âˆˆ hs0 âˆ§ F)), Â¬ s1 âˆˆ s0)
  mtbiri((s1 âˆˆ s0 â†”(s1 âˆˆ hs0 âˆ§ F)), s1 âˆˆ s0, (s1 âˆˆ hs0 âˆ§ F))
  intnan(s1 âˆˆ hs0, wfal)
  fal()
  id((s1 âˆˆ s0 â†”(s1 âˆˆ hs0 âˆ§ F)))
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wfal.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wfal)
}

blocks.name: ax-nul
blocks.content: The Null Set Axiom of ZF set theory. It was derived as ~ axnul above and is therefore redundant, but we state it as a separate axiom here so that its uses can be identified more easily. (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-2003.)

blocks.name: 0ex
blocks.content: The Null Set Axiom of ZF set theory: the empty set exists. Corollary 5.16 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 20. For the unabbreviated version, see ~ ax-nul . (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1993.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 9-Jul-2011.)

blocks.name: al0ssb
blocks.content: The empty set is the unique class which is a subclass of any set. (Contributed by AV, 24-Aug-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm al0ssb(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wb(wal(s0, wss(c0, cv(s0))), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  impbii(wal(s0, wss(c0, cv(s0))), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  spcv(s0, emptycls, wss(c0, cv(s0)), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  0ex()
  syl6bb(wceq(cv(s0), emptycls), wss(c0, cv(s0)), wceq(c0, emptycls), wss(c0, emptycls))
  sseq2(cv(s0), emptycls, c0)
  ss0b(c0)
  mpbiri(wceq(c0, emptycls), wal(s0, wss(c0, cv(s0))), wal(s0, wss(emptycls, cv(s0))))
  ax-gen(s0, wss(emptycls, cv(s0)))
  0ss(cv(s0))
  albidv(s0, wceq(c0, emptycls), wss(c0, cv(s0)), wss(emptycls, cv(s0)))
  sseq1(c0, emptycls, cv(s0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm al0ssb(setvar s0, class c0) {
  âŠ¢ (âˆ€(s0, c0 âŠ† s0)â†” c0 = âˆ…)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  impbii(âˆ€(s0, c0 âŠ† s0), c0 = âˆ…)
  spcv(s0, emptycls, c0 âŠ† s0, c0 = âˆ…)
  0ex()
  syl6bb(s0 = âˆ…, c0 âŠ† s0, c0 = âˆ…, c0 âŠ† âˆ…)
  sseq2(s0, emptycls, c0)
  ss0b(c0)
  mpbiri(c0 = âˆ…, âˆ€(s0, c0 âŠ† s0), âˆ€(s0, âˆ… âŠ† s0))
  ax-gen(s0, âˆ… âŠ† s0)
  0ss(s0)
  albidv(s0, c0 = âˆ…, c0 âŠ† s0, âˆ… âŠ† s0)
  sseq1(c0, emptycls, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: sseliALT
blocks.content: Alternate proof of ~ sseli illustrating the use of the weak deduction theorem to prove it from the inference ~ sselii . (Contributed by NM, 24-Aug-2018.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm sseliALT(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wss(c1, c2)
} = {
  dedth3v(c1, csn(emptycls), c2, csn(emptycls), c0, emptycls, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c0, cif(c2, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1))), wcel(cif(c0, emptycls, wcel(c0, c1)), cif(c2, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1))))
  biidd(wceq(c1, cif(c1, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1))), wcel(c0, c2))
  eleq2(c2, cif(c2, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1)), c0)
  eleq1(c0, cif(c0, emptycls, wcel(c0, c1)), cif(c2, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1)))
  sselii(cif(c0, emptycls, wcel(c0, c1)), cif(c2, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1)), cif(c1, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1)))
  keephyp3v(c1, csn(emptycls), c2, csn(emptycls), c0, emptycls, wss(cif(c1, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1)), cif(c2, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1))), wcel(c0, c1), wss(c1, c2), wss(cif(c1, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1)), c2), wss(cif(c1, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1)), cif(c2, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1))), wss(csn(emptycls), csn(emptycls)), wss(cif(c1, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1)), csn(emptycls)), wss(cif(c1, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1)), cif(c2, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1))))
  sseq1(c1, cif(c1, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1)), c2)
  sseq2(c2, cif(c2, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1)), cif(c1, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1)))
  biidd(wceq(c0, cif(c0, emptycls, wcel(c0, c1))), wss(cif(c1, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1)), cif(c2, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1))))
  sseq1(csn(emptycls), cif(c1, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1)), csn(emptycls))
  sseq2(csn(emptycls), cif(c2, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1)), cif(c1, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1)))
  biidd(wceq(emptycls, cif(c0, emptycls, wcel(c0, c1))), wss(cif(c1, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1)), cif(c2, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1))))
  ssid(csn(emptycls))
  elimhyp3v(c1, csn(emptycls), c2, csn(emptycls), c0, emptycls, wcel(cif(c0, emptycls, wcel(c0, c1)), cif(c1, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1))), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cif(c1, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1))), wcel(c0, cif(c1, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1))), wcel(emptycls, csn(emptycls)), wcel(emptycls, cif(c1, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1))), wcel(emptycls, cif(c1, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1))))
  eleq2(c1, cif(c1, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1)), c0)
  biidd(wceq(c2, cif(c2, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1))), wcel(c0, cif(c1, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1))))
  eleq1(c0, cif(c0, emptycls, wcel(c0, c1)), cif(c1, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1)))
  eleq2(csn(emptycls), cif(c1, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1)), emptycls)
  biidd(wceq(csn(emptycls), cif(c2, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1))), wcel(emptycls, cif(c1, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1))))
  eleq1(emptycls, cif(c0, emptycls, wcel(c0, c1)), cif(c1, csn(emptycls), wcel(c0, c1)))
  snid(emptycls)
  0ex()
}

thm sseliALT(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  âŠ¢ (c0 âˆˆ c1 â†’ c0 âˆˆ c2)
  âŠ£ c1 âŠ† c2
} = {
  dedth3v(c1, { âˆ… }, c2, { âˆ… }, c0, emptycls, c0 âˆˆ c1, c0 âˆˆ c2, c0 âˆˆ c2, c0 âˆˆ if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c2, { âˆ… }), if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c0, âˆ…)âˆˆ if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c2, { âˆ… }))
  biidd(c1 = if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c1, { âˆ… }), c0 âˆˆ c2)
  eleq2(c2, if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c2, { âˆ… }), c0)
  eleq1(c0, if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c0, âˆ…), if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c2, { âˆ… }))
  sselii(if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c0, âˆ…), if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c2, { âˆ… }), if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c1, { âˆ… }))
  keephyp3v(c1, { âˆ… }, c2, { âˆ… }, c0, emptycls, if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c1, { âˆ… })âŠ† if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c2, { âˆ… }), c0 âˆˆ c1, c1 âŠ† c2, if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c1, { âˆ… })âŠ† c2, if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c1, { âˆ… })âŠ† if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c2, { âˆ… }), { âˆ… } âŠ† { âˆ… }, if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c1, { âˆ… })âŠ† { âˆ… }, if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c1, { âˆ… })âŠ† if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c2, { âˆ… }))
  sseq1(c1, if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c1, { âˆ… }), c2)
  sseq2(c2, if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c2, { âˆ… }), if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c1, { âˆ… }))
  biidd(c0 = if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c0, âˆ…), if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c1, { âˆ… })âŠ† if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c2, { âˆ… }))
  sseq1({ âˆ… }, if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c1, { âˆ… }), { âˆ… })
  sseq2({ âˆ… }, if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c2, { âˆ… }), if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c1, { âˆ… }))
  biidd(âˆ… = if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c0, âˆ…), if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c1, { âˆ… })âŠ† if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c2, { âˆ… }))
  ssid({ âˆ… })
  elimhyp3v(c1, { âˆ… }, c2, { âˆ… }, c0, emptycls, if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c0, âˆ…)âˆˆ if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c1, { âˆ… }), c0 âˆˆ c1, c0 âˆˆ if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c1, { âˆ… }), c0 âˆˆ if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c1, { âˆ… }), âˆ… âˆˆ { âˆ… }, âˆ… âˆˆ if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c1, { âˆ… }), âˆ… âˆˆ if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c1, { âˆ… }))
  eleq2(c1, if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c1, { âˆ… }), c0)
  biidd(c2 = if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c2, { âˆ… }), c0 âˆˆ if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c1, { âˆ… }))
  eleq1(c0, if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c0, âˆ…), if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c1, { âˆ… }))

  biidd({ âˆ… } = if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c2, { âˆ… }), âˆ… âˆˆ if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c1, { âˆ… }))
  eleq1(emptycls, if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c0, âˆ…), if(c0 âˆˆ c1, c1, { âˆ… }))
  snid(emptycls)
  0ex()
}

blocks.name: csbexg
blocks.content: The existence of proper substitution into a class. (Contributed by NM, 10-Nov-2005.) (Revised by NM, 17-Aug-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm csbexg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(csb(s0, c2, c0), universe))
} = {
  pm2.61ian(wal(s0, wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(csb(s0, c2, c0), universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  syl5eqel(csb(s0, c2, c0), universe, cab(hs0, wsbc(s0, c2, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), wa(wcel(c2, universe), wal(s0, wcel(c0, c1))))
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c2, c0)
  imp(wcel(c2, universe), wal(s0, wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(cab(hs0, wsbc(s0, c2, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), universe))
  sylibd(wcel(c2, universe), wal(s0, wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(cab(hs0, wsbc(s0, c2, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), universe), wsbc(s0, c2, wcel(cab(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), universe)))
  syl5(wcel(c2, universe), wal(s0, wcel(c0, c1)), wsbc(s0, c2, wcel(cab(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), universe)), wal(s0, wcel(cab(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), universe)))
  alimi(s0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cab(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), universe))
  syl5eqel(cab(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), universe, c0, wcel(c0, c1))
  abid2(hs0, c0)
  elex(c0, c1)
  spsbc(s0, c2, universe, wcel(cab(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), universe))
  sbcabel(s0, hs0, c2, universe, universe, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfcv(s0, universe)
  adantr(wn(wcel(c2, universe)), wal(s0, wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(csb(s0, c2, c0), universe))
  syl6eqel(csb(s0, c2, c0), universe, emptycls, wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  csbprc(s0, c2, c0)
  0ex()
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:

  âŠ¢ (âˆ€(s0, c0 âˆˆ c1)â†’[c2 / s0]c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
} = {
  pm2.61ian(âˆ€(s0, c0 âˆˆ c1), [c2 / s0]c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c2 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  syl5eqel([c2 / s0]c0, universe, { hs0 |[c2 / s0]hs0 âˆˆ c0 }, (c2 âˆˆ ğ•Œ âˆ§ âˆ€(s0, c0 âˆˆ c1)))
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c2, c0)
  imp(c2 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, âˆ€(s0, c0 âˆˆ c1), { hs0 |[c2 / s0]hs0 âˆˆ c0 } âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  sylibd(c2 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, âˆ€(s0, c0 âˆˆ c1), { hs0 |[c2 / s0]hs0 âˆˆ c0 } âˆˆ ğ•Œ, [c2 / s0]{ hs0 | hs0 âˆˆ c0 } âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  syl5(c2 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, âˆ€(s0, c0 âˆˆ c1), [c2 / s0]{ hs0 | hs0 âˆˆ c0 } âˆˆ ğ•Œ, âˆ€(s0, { hs0 | hs0 âˆˆ c0 } âˆˆ ğ•Œ))
  alimi(s0, c0 âˆˆ c1, { hs0 | hs0 âˆˆ c0 } âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  syl5eqel({ hs0 | hs0 âˆˆ c0 }, universe, c0, c0 âˆˆ c1)
  abid2(hs0, c0)
  elex(c0, c1)
  spsbc(s0, c2, universe, { hs0 | hs0 âˆˆ c0 } âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  sbcabel(s0, hs0, c2, universe, universe, hs0 âˆˆ c0)
  nfcv(s0, universe)
  adantr(Â¬ c2 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, âˆ€(s0, c0 âˆˆ c1), [c2 / s0]c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  syl6eqel([c2 / s0]c0, universe, emptycls, Â¬ c2 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  csbprc(s0, c2, c0)
  0ex()
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

}

blocks.name: csbex
blocks.content: The existence of proper substitution into a class. (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-2007.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 29-Jun-2011.) (Revised by NM, 17-Aug-2018.)

blocks.name: unisn2
blocks.content: A version of ~ unisn without the ` A e. _V ` hypothesis. (Contributed by Stefan Allan, 14-Mar-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm unisn2(class c0) {
  |- wcel(cuni(csn(c0)), cpr(emptycls, c0))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wcel(cuni(csn(c0)), cpr(emptycls, c0)), wcel(c0, universe))
  eqeltrd(cuni(csn(c0)), cpr(emptycls, c0), c0, wcel(c0, universe))
  unisng(c0, universe)
  prid2g(c0, universe, emptycls)
  syl6eqel(cuni(csn(c0)), cpr(emptycls, c0), cuni(emptycls), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  unieqd(csn(c0), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  biimpi(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(csn(c0), emptycls))
  snprc(c0)
  eqeltri(cuni(emptycls), cpr(emptycls, c0), emptycls)
  uni0()
  prid1(emptycls, c0)
  0ex()
}
